verbs.description: President Trump ’s former campaign chairman [V: is] accused of witness tampering while on house arrest for other charges .
[ARG1: President Trump ’s former campaign chairman] is [V: accused] [ARG2: of witness tampering while on house arrest for other charges] .
President Trump ’s former campaign chairman is accused of [ARG1: witness] [V: tampering] while on house arrest for other charges .
